name: Classic Cheeseburger
description: A juicy beef patty topped with melted cheddar cheese, lettuce, tomato, and pickles.

name: Veggie Delight
description: A delicious plant-based patty with fresh lettuce, tomato, cucumber, and avocado.

name: BBQ Bacon Burger
description: Beef patty topped with crispy bacon, BBQ sauce, and fried onion rings.

name: Spicy Chicken Burger
description: Crispy fried chicken breast with spicy mayo, lettuce, and pickles.

name: Egg & Cheese Sandwich
description: Scrambled eggs with cheddar cheese in a soft toasted bun.

name: Mushroom Swiss Burger
description: Beef patty topped with sautéed mushrooms and melted Swiss cheese.

name: Falafel Burger
description: A crispy falafel patty with hummus, lettuce, and tomatoes.

name: Double Decker Burger
description: Two beef patties stacked with cheddar cheese, lettuce, and tomato.

name: Paneer Tikka Burger
description: Grilled paneer marinated in tikka spices with mint chutney and onions.

name: Turkey Burger
description: Lean turkey patty with avocado, lettuce, and tomato on a whole wheat bun.

name: Egg Salad Burger
description: A creamy egg salad on a toasted bun with lettuce and cucumber.

name: Fish Fillet Burger
description: Crispy fish fillet with tartar sauce, lettuce, and tomato.

description: A black bean patty with avocado, salsa, and lettuce in a whole wheat bun.
